parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.70

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sensors

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Shares the target vehicle via datalink to the [[Side]] center for a given time.

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> This command must be executed locally to the vehicle/turret you want to tell the target about. <comment><!-- What is this supposed to mean? This command does not tell the target anything... --></comment>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> side [[reportRemoteTarget]] [target, time]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> side: [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> target: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> time: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[blufor]] [[reportRemoteTarget]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[vehicle]] [[player]], 60];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setVehicleRadar]] [[vehicleReportRemoteTargets]] [[setVehicleReportRemoteTargets]] [[vehicleReceiveRemoteTargets]] [[setVehicleReceiveRemoteTargets]] [[vehicleReportOwnPosition]] [[setVehicleReportOwnPosition]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on February 14, 2021 - 11:05 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Freddo3000|Freddo3000]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This command cannot be used on projectiles, such as IR Grenades.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
